name: Justice
fortune_telling: A legal verdict will be rendered soon

light: Weighing an issue carefully before taking action

shadow: Playing by the book even when it is destructive or counterproductive to do so

mythical_spiritual: Samson. Hercules. Daniel in the lion's den. The sinless Christ.
